BBox2

Defines a axis-aligned bounding box (in 2D)

Constructor

Parameters

Vector2&

top left corner for bbox

bottomRight
Vector2&

bottom right corner for bbox

Empty
bool Empty()

Determines if bbox is empty

Returns

Returns true if bbox is empty. False otherwise.

AddPoint
void AddPoint(
float x,
float y
)

Adds the specified point to the bounding box. If the point is outside the bbox then the bbox's dimensions are expanded to include the point.

Parameters
x
float

x coordinate for point

y
float

y coordinate for point

PointInside
bool PointInside(
const Vector2 &p,
float tolerance
)

Determines if the specified point, given some tolerance, is inside the bounding box

Parameters
p
const Vector2&

point to test

tolerance
float

tolerance to use when testing point

Returns

Returns true if point is inside bbox. False otherwise.

BBox3

Defines a axis-aligned bounding box (in 3D)

The bounding box is assumed to be built as follows:

        +---------------+ P2
       /|              /|
      / |             / |
     /  |            /  |
    /   |           /   |
   +---------------+    |
   |    |          |    |
^  |    +----------|----+
|  |   /           |   / ^
|Y |  /            |  / /
|  | /             | / / Z
|  |/              |/ /
   +---------------+
 P1
     ---------->X

This code also assumes that the bounding volume is aligned with the coordinate system axis.

Functions
BBox3
BBox3()

Default constructor

BBox3
BBox3(
Vector3 &frontTopLeft,
Vector3 &backBottomRight
)
Parameters
frontTopLeft
Vector3&

top left corner for bounding box

backBottomRight
Vector3&

lower right corner for bounding box

Empty
bool Empty()

Determines if bbox is empty

Returns

Returns true if bbox is empty. False otherwise.

AddPoint
void AddPoint(
float x,
float y,
float z
)

Adds a point to a bounding box. If the point is outside the bbox, the bbox is updated.
